item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways. The emojify function can be called directly in templates or Inline Shortcodes.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: Contact for any feedback or advertisement query you may have, Email : masood(@)bloggyaani(dot)com

item.title: Moving With Hugo
item.description: Hugo uses the excellent Go html/template library for its template engine. It is an extremely lightweight engine that provides a very small amount of logic. In our experience that it is just the right amount of logic to be able to create a good static website.

item.title: About
item.description: Our website builds with Hugo static site generator and Mainroad theme. This demo allows you to see what Mainroad based website looks like before deciding to go with it.
